## NFTCollection.mintAdditionalSupplyTo() method

Mint additional supply of an NFT to the specified wallet

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mintAdditionalSupplyTo(to: string, mintAddress: string): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  to | string | the address to mint the NFT to |
|  mintAddress | string | the mint address to mint additional supply to |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string&gt;

the mint address of the minted NFT

## Example


```jsx
const to = "..."
const mintAddress = "..."
const address = await program.mintTo(to, mintAddress);
```
